label: BODY

text: In addition to Schedules I and J, this statement must be completed by every individual Chapter 13 debtor, whether or not filing
label: TITLE

text: jointly.  Joint debtors may complete one statement only.
label: BODY

text: Part I. REPORT OF INCOME
label: BODY

text: Marital/filing status. Check the box that applies and complete the balance of this part of this statement as directed.
label: BODY

text: Unmarried. Complete only Column A (“Debtor’s Income”) for Lines 2-10.
label: BODY

text: Married. Complete both Column A (“Debtor’s Income”) and Column B (“Spouse’s Income”) for Lines 2-10.
label: BODY

text: All figures must reflect average monthly income for the six calendar months prior to filing the
label: BODY

text: bankruptcy case, ending on the last day of the month before the filing.  If you received differ-
label: BODY

text: ent amounts of income during these six months, you must total the amounts received during
label: BODY

text: the six months, divide this total by six, and enter the result on the appropriate line.

text: Enter the amount from Line 11.

text: uted to the household expenses of you or your dependents.  Otherwise, enter zero.

label: BODY

label: BODY

label: BODY

text: ment.

text: Do not complete Parts IV, V, or VI.

text: Subpart C: Deductions for Debt Payment
label: BODY

text: Future payments on secured claims. For each of your debts that is secured by an interest in prop-
label: BODY

text: erty that you own, list the name of the creditor, identify the property securing the debt, and state the Av-
label: BODY

text: erage Monthly Payment.  The Average Monthly Payment is the total of all amounts contractually due to
label: BODY

text: each Secured Creditor in the 60 months following the filing of the bankruptcy case, divided by 60.  Mort-
label: BODY

text: gage debts should include payments of taxes and insurance required by the mortgage.  If necessary, list
label: BODY

text: additional entries on a separate page.
